comments.body: Shall we pointer them to the kubernete.io's version of the docs? I remember the htmlpreview pages cannot jump between operations and definitions.

Yes, outside links from htmlpreview pages dont work: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/15910.

kubernetes.io does not have autoscaling and batch docs yet: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes.github.io/issues/157.

Also, I guess, kubernetes.io will only have the api-ref docs from release branch. This is if someone wants to view the api-ref docs as per HEAD code.

Thanks for the explanation. Could you explicitly add in the description that these links apply to HEAD? And could you add the links pointing to the kubernete.io and say those are for releases?
 I know there is a warning at the top of every file, but I'm afraid people will ignore the warning anyway.
Will this particular doc be copied to kubernetes.io?

Yes this doc should be copied to kubernetes.io whenever we push docs.
I guess that should happen in a few weeks whenever we have docs added/updated for new 1.2 features. cc @kubernetes/docs 

In versionize-docs, we replace HEAD by release version: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/0e229d59f09c0f221eb45ad193f5c0f8ef875fc9/build/versionize-docs.sh#L67. We can probably update it to replace by kubernetes.io links instead. I am not sure what the kubernetes.io link is going to be. Filed https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/23159 to keep track.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@Use the following reference docs to understand the kubernetes REST API for various API group versions:

* v1: [operations](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/HEAD/docs/api-reference/v1/operations.html), [model definitions](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/HEAD/docs/api-reference/v1/definitions.html)
* extensions/v1beta1: [operations](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/HEAD/docs/api-reference/extensions/v1beta1/operations.html), [model definitions](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/HEAD/docs/api-reference/extensions/v1beta1/definitions.html)
* batch/v1: [operations](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/HEAD/docs/api-reference/batch/v1/operations.html), [model definitions](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/HEAD/docs/api-reference/batch/v1/definitions.html)
